Sinopse: Larry Daley just can't keep hold of a steady job, but he begins to think there may be hope at last as he is hired as a night security guard at the Museum of Natural History. Everything goes well on the first night for him. That is until the exhibits start to come to life after the sun sets. He now has a choice to make. He can either continue on finding another job or manage the exhibits.—FilmFanUK
